functions.name: create_packaging_line
functions.description: Creates a new instance of a packaging line.

arguments.name: n
arguments.description: Amount of sub-machines to add to the packaging line.

functions.name: add_conveyer_belt
functions.description: This method of the PackagingLine type adds a conveyer belt to the packaging line. The converybelt runs through the machines, giving all machines access to the contents of the conveyer belt. Sub-machines are zero-index from left to right.

arguments.name: beginning
arguments.description: Index of the first sub-machine to connect the conveyer belt to.

arguments.name: end
arguments.description: Index of the last sub-machine to connect the conveyer belt to.

returns.description: The result of subtracting the second number from the first.

functions.name: add_packaging_robot
functions.description: This method of the SubMachine type adds a packaging robot to the sub-machine.

arguments.name: machine_type
arguments.description: Type of the packaging machine to add.

functions.name: attach_funnel
functions.description: This method of the SubMachine type attaches a funnel to the sub-machine. The method checks if a funnel is already attached to the sub-machine. If a funnel is already attached, the mothod returns false, otherwise true.
